testcase.brief: DHCP enable, no static IP address, DHCP get IP address failed after a timeout interval, verify AP will fallback to use default IP
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -DHCP enable, no static IP address. -Box to DHCP server traffic is unreachable.
Test Procedure: 1: In default timeout interval(20s), debug dhcpc basic, check how long will fallback to use default IP address. _debug dhcpc basic 2: Set DHCP timeout interval to 0, check how long will fallback to use default IP address. interface m0 dhcp client timeout 0 3: Set DHCP timeout interval to "x", check how long will fallback to use default IP address. interface m0 dhcp client timeout x 4: Check interface mgt0 IP address (show interface mgt0 ) 5: Check interface mgt0 DHCP client (show interface mgt0 dhcp client) 6: Check DHCP packets send out _ff id 1 src-mac xxxx src-port 68 bidirectional _kdebug fe basic

step.desc: -open debug, config incorrect vlan for mgt0 -Box to DHCP server traffic is unreachable.
step.console: -v "_debug dhcpc basic" -v "clear log all" -v "interface mgt0 vlan 100"

step.log-match: -e "Can not get network setting through DHCP within interval 20"

step.desc: check whether fallback to use default IP address after 20secs
- DHCP enable, no static IP address.
step.console: -v "no interface mgt0 vlan" -v "interface mgt0 dhcp client"

step.desc: Set DHCP timeout interval to 0, check how long will fallback to use default IP address.
step.console: -v "interface mgt0 dhcp client timeout 0" -v "interface mgt0 vlan 100" -v "save config"

step.desc: ip address will Never fallback to use default IP address, always will be 0.0.0.0
Set DHCP timeout interval to "x", check how long will fallback to use default IP address.
step.console: -v "_debug dhcpc basic" -v "clear log all" -v "interface mgt0 dhcp client timeout 5" -v "interface mgt0 dhcp client"

step.log-match: -e "Can not get network setting through DHCP within interval 5"

step.desc: check whether fallbacks to us default IP address after 5secs
Check interface mgt0 IP address (show interface mgt0 )
Check interface mgt0 DHCP client (show interface mgt0 dhcp client)
Check DHCP packets send out _ff id 1 src-mac xxxx src-port 68 bidirectional _kdebug fe basic Debug console
step.console: -v "clear log all" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "_ff id 1 src-mac ${ap1_mgt0_mac} src-port 68 bidirectional"
